session.goal: Create reusable drag-and-drop tab system components

changes_summary: Created two new files implementing a reusable tab system with drag-and-drop reordering and localStorage persistence
decisions_made: Followed existing Zustand + persist pattern from SidebarStore.ts for tab order persistence
Used @dnd-kit library (already in project) for drag-and-drop functionality matching Sidebar implementation
Implemented smart tab order merging: preserves stored order while appending new tabs
Created SortableTab sub-component following SortableNavItem pattern
Added reorderable prop to allow opt-in drag-and-drop behavior
Used horizontal scrolling with scrollbar-thin for responsive mobile layout
Applied glass-morphism dark theme styling consistent with app design

continuation.next_immediate_step: Both files are complete and type-check successfully. Ready for integration into pages.
next_three_steps: Integrate PageTabs into relevant page components (e.g., Dashboard, Reports, Profile)
Test drag-and-drop functionality and localStorage persistence
Consider adding visual feedback for reorderable mode (e.g., hover state or toggle button)
